main_definition: To make progress or move forward, often in the context of technology, development, or personal growth.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Moving forward in space or time.
meanings_and_examples.example: The car advanced ahead on the highway.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Forward progress in technology and innovation.
meanings_and_examples.example: Television has seen many advances over the past decades, improving picture quality and adding new features.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Progress or improvement in one's personal life or career.
meanings_and_examples.example: After years of hard work, she made significant advances in her field as a leading expert.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Paying money forward in advance for goods or services.
meanings_and_examples.example: The couple decided to make an advance payment on their wedding venue deposit.
